issue.title: Wrong behavior of the metadata edition form for relationship cardinality
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Cardinality of relationships toward classes and attributes does not correctly behave in the metadata edition form, for example :
- relationship toward attribute 0..n : no + icone available to add instance
- relationship toward class 0..1 : + icone avalaible whatever the number of instance already added

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
